text: Gundlachtudora is a genus of land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Pomatiidae."Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == Species == Species within the genus Gundlachtudora include: * Gundlachtudora decolorata (Gundlach in Pfeiffer, 1859) == References == Category:Pomatiidae
title: Gundlachtudora
